function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to private balconies in housing for the elderly in high-rise residential buildings","Impact":"Decreased resident morale and satisfaction","Mitigation":"Ensure access to private balconies in high-rise residential buildings for the elderly","Technologies":"Design and construction of accessible balcony spaces","People":"Elderly residents in high-rise residential buildings","Owner":"Building developers and architects"},{"Description":"Inadequate support for physical distancing in balcony designs","Impact":"Inability to support physical distancing between apartment units, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Design balcony spaces to support physical distancing between apartment units","Technologies":"Biophilic design, architectural planning for physical distancing","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"Architects and building developers"},{"Description":"Lack of outdoor green spaces in urban apartment buildings","Impact":"Limitation in opportunities for nature experiences and urban farming, impacting mental health and wellness","Mitigation":"Creation of sunrooms and balcony spaces for urban farming, increase access to nature experiences","Technologies":"Biophilic design, urban farming technologies","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"Building developers and architects"}]}
